name: writing
description: the ability to communicate effectively in writing.

name: public speaking
description: the ability to communicate effectively in front of an audience.

name: math
description: the ability to solve mathematical problems.

name: science
description: the study of the natural world.

name: dance
description: the movement of the body to music.

name: foreign languages
description: the ability to communicate in a language other than english.

name: critical thinking
description: the ability to think clearly and rationally about a problem or issue.

name: problem solving
description: the ability to identify and solve problems.

name: decision making
description: the ability to make decisions in a timely and effective manner.

name: analysis
description: the ability to break down a problem or issue into its component parts and understand how they relate to each other.

name: leadership
description: the ability to motivate and inspire others to achieve a common goal.

name: teamwork
description: the ability to work effectively with others to achieve a common goal.

name: communication
description: the ability to share information and ideas effectively with others.

name: listening
description: the ability to pay attention and understand what others are saying.
